dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic and technology coexisted, the city of New Haven was plagued by corruption.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Jameson
dialogues.text: I've received reports of a mysterious figure lurking in the shadows. I need you to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist (Alex)
dialogues.text: Roger that, Captain. I'll check it out.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As Alex delved deeper into the city's underbelly, she stumbled upon a hidden underground market.
